doc.field: This series consists of production and promotional materials for the various commissioned exhibitions and projects supported by Creative Time. These materials include artists' information (CVs, slides/videos/photographs, and artists' statements); blueprints; rental contracts; permits; correspondence; proposals; exhibition catalogs, brochures, and invitations to openings; site photographs; installation photographs; budgets; reviews; press releases; promotional items (hats, T-shirts, and cups); digital images and videos (mockups for exhibitions, images of final exhibitions and installations, and test runs and tours of installations), and mailed objects created by artist Marcos Kurtycz. Additionally, samples of artists' earlier or later work are included, most likely sent as part of their proposal packages. Also included are unrealized projects and in a few cases, exhibitions or projects not supported by Creative Time. The vast size of the production materials for each exhibition depicts the complexities involved in commissioning public art projects and the variety of locations, both national and international, selected for exhibitions.
